| HistoryText             = '''Project: Delta''' originally was a [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] top-secret training program, later closed and secretly reconverted by [[Roxxon Energy Corporation (Earth-616)|Roxxon Corporation]]{{r|Nick Fury vs. S.H.I.E.L.D. #1}} into a procedure which converted nearly deceased S.H.I.E.L.D. agents into Deltan-Model [[Life-Model Decoy]]s.{{r|Nick Fury vs. S.H.I.E.L.D. #5}}
